version_description:
1. New chapter of Roam
2. New realm-God Realm
3. New chapter of Hell

▲ It’s June again and we are going to have a immortal market discount event “Immortal Market on Sales”. There are abundant tokens and other precious items in ranking rewards waiting for you to redeem! More details please check in game!
▲System Optimization.

1. New Void Event
2. New Equipment Refinement Function
3. New Wonderland, Heaven Fairyland and Cultivation Rewards Event
4. New Heaven Fashion Event

1.New Beast Cruise System
2.New Kunlun Taoism Meeting System
3.Adjustment for Main Interface

1. New Illustration System
2. New Evil Factions Servants
3. Food Festival

1.Christmas Event
（1）Christmas Cabin：feed the reindeer and gain gifts from the Santa
（2）Tianyan Secret Treasure：gain abundant rewards from Tianyanyi
（3）Snowy Reindeer：cultivate the reindeer to gain the beast
2. Taoists recall event
Recall your friends to cultivate together
3. New Time-limited Benefit Gift Pack
（1）Free Gift Pack：claim free gift pack weekly and monthly
（2）Benefit Pack：Limited spirit pet, immortal force and servant pack
4.Warm Winter Event
Gain abundant rewards and beast in the monthly event
5. Linglong Pavilion Leaderboard optimization adjustment

1. New Spring Festival events
The first preview of Spring Festival events: 15 days of sign-ins to unlock 4-star limited beast, red packets and other rewards!
The second preview of Spring Festival events: Spring jigsaw, Spring Blessing and Spring Festival Monster are waiting for you to explore!
The third preview of Spring Festival events: Valentine's Day, Maze exploration, Spring Lantern Festival and Linglong Treasure are waiting for you to experience!
2. New six-star beast panda
At the beginning of a new year and the renewal of all the immortal world, the Tao is divided into yin and yang and the convergence of yin and yang gave birth to the immortal beast "panda". Taoists can gain the beast by feeding them!
3. New limited outfits
Only fairies around, dragon and phoenix around can show your immortal style!
